Distance from client¶

distance_from_client.currentPoseHandler(data)[source]¶

Handler for the subscriber current_pose_velocity_publisher, which receives the robot’s current pose and velocity, and uses the GetGoal function to update the global variables distance and v_average.

distance_from_client.getDistanceAndAvgVelocity(request)[source]¶

It is triggered when a call to the service is made and returns the global variables that store the average velocity and distance to the target.

distance_from_client.getGoal(x_current, y_current, v_current_x, v_current_y)[source]¶

Calculates and returns the following:

  1. The distance between pose_current and pose_target.
  2. The average velocity of the robot.

Last Target¶

last_target.getLastTarget(request)[source]¶

Fetches the target pose from the parameter server and returns it when the service is called.

Planning client¶

planning_client.initialize_publisher_subscriber()[source]¶

Initializes the publisher and subscriber and stores them in a global variable.

planning_client.planning_client()[source]¶

This function handles the task of transmitting the goal pose to the action server.

planning_client.publishPoseAndVelocity(msg)[source]¶

This function serves as the handler for the subscriber listening to the topic /odom. It receives messages from odom, extracts pose and velocity data, and publishes them on the topic current_pose_velocity_publisher.
